parameter.name: object.property.auto.Definition
parameter.value: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW &quot;EMP_DETAILS_VIEW&quot; (&quot;EMPLOYEE_ID&quot;, &quot;JOB_ID&quot;, &quot;MANAGER_ID&quot;, &quot;DEPARTMENT_ID&quot;, &quot;LOCATION_ID&quot;, &quot;COUNTRY_ID&quot;, &quot;FIRST_NAME&quot;, &quot;LAST_NAME&quot;, &quot;SALARY&quot;, &quot;COMMISSION_PCT&quot;, &quot;DEPARTMENT_NAME&quot;, &quot;JOB_TITLE&quot;, &quot;CITY&quot;, &quot;STATE_PROVINCE&quot;, &quot;COUNTRY_NAME&quot;, &quot;REGION_NAME&quot;) AS <br> SELECT <br> e.employee_id, <br> e.job_id, <br> e.manager_id, <br> e.department_id, <br> d.location_id, <br> l.country_id, <br> e.first_name, <br> e.last_name, <br> e.salary, <br> e.commission_pct, <br> d.department_name, <br> j.job_title, <br> l.city, <br> l.state_province, <br> c.country_name, <br> r.region_name <br> FROM <br> employees e, <br> departments d, <br> jobs j, <br> locations l, <br> countries c, <br> regions r <br> WHERE e.department_id = d.department_id <br> AND d.location_id = l.location_id <br> AND l.country_id = c.country_id <br> AND c.region_id = r.region_id <br> AND j.job_id = e.job_id <br> WITH READ ONLY
